Title: Establishes an exception for victims of child sexual abuse to the trust exemption from application to the satisfaction of money judgment
Summary: Establishes an exception for victims of child sexual abuse to the trust exemption from application to the satisfaction of a money judgment; allows victims of sexual abuse to enforce a money judgment against their abusers' trusts when the judgment was obtained as a result of such abuse; defines child sexual abuse.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, in relation to establishing an exception for victims of child sexual abuse to the trust exemption from application to the satisfaction of a money judgment
